document_data.caption: A map showing Koart in southern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Koart
document_data.mainbody: '''Koart''' was a small town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Koart was located near the heart of the kingdom of [[Corwell]] along the [[Corwell Road]] just east of [[Caer Corwell]]. The town sat in the shadow of [[the Highlands]] to the north.
